content: let your creativity soar when you embark on a magical crochet journey and bring sparkle the unicorn to life nienke jongstra designed this enchanting speckled creature with a rainbow mane cascading tail of spirals and gentle ethereal expression using scheepjes catona available in a vast range of colours and offering balls in four different sizes from 10-100g this 100% mercerised cotton yarn is a favourite with amigurumi creators for good reason it has a smooth touch great stitch definition and a delicate sheen that magically catches the light sparkle would make the perfect gift for a little one with a big imagination and catona ensures that your cherished creation will be child-friendly and remain vibrant for years to come the full written pattern for the sparkle the unicorn which stands at 26cm high and is 15cm long can be found in yarn the after party 61 **materials little darling version** scheepjes little darling 100% polyester yarn a 401 ice bear 4 x 50g/90m yarn b - i scheepjes little darling colour pack veggie patch 8 x 25g/45m yarn j 410 panda 5 5 mm crochet hook cardboard toiletroll to support neck polyester stuffing stitch markers **materials catona version** scheepjes catona 100% mercerised cotton yarn a 105 bridal white 1 x 50g/125m ball plus 1 x 25g/62 5m ball 1 x 10g/25m ball in each of the following colours yarn b 179 topaz yarn c 114 shocking pink yarn d 282 ultra violet yarn e 411 sweet orange yarn f 205 kiwi yarn g 253 tropic yarn h 511 cornflower yarn i 527 midnight yarn j 110 jet black or scrap yarn for eyes and nostrils 2 5mm crochet hook polyester stuffing stitch markers
